Constructors

| Improve this Doc View Source

AzureIotHub(String)

Interacts with an Azure IoT Hub instance. If given string is a file path of an existing file, the contents of the file will be used as connection string. If given string is not the file path to an existing file, the string will be set as connection string itself.

Declaration
public AzureIotHub(string connectionString = "C:\\Data\\Users\\DefaultAccount\\AppData\\Local\\Packages\\Sting.Measurements-uwp_gk6cf97c3a7py\\LocalState\\DeviceConnectionString.txt")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String connectionString

File path or connection string.

ReceiveCloudToDeviceMessageAsync()

Receives a Message in string format from the connected IoT Hub.

Declaration

SendDeviceToCloudMessageAsync(String)

Sends a given string to the IoT Hub which the connection string points to.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String msg
